item.title: How to add shops (Solved)
item.dc:creator: @sckum555 sckum555
item.description:
@sckum555 wrote:

Part 1:

Open shops.cfg

put in

shop = 1	@red@Bob's_Test_Shop				1	1	4151	100

shop = 1 = WanneShop number (Explained later)

@red@Bob’s_Test_Shop = the thing at the top that says which shop it is.

1 1 4151 100 = idk, idk, which item in the shop, the amount.

Part 2:

IN client.java:

Search for;

case 17:

Below a few NPC’s, add something such as;

	} else if (NPCID == bobnpcid) {

skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; WanneShop = 1;

bobnpcid = id for the character
WanneShop = what shop id

Read full topic
